text: [Music]
when you lose motivation
there will be moments when you feel
you've lost your motivation and don't
want to do anything
even people who are successful in life
and work fall into the state
however let's see how they deal with
this down mentality that helps them move
forward and achieve great things
motivation is one of the master keys
that will motivate you and keep you
going every day
if you're not motivated you'll tend to
procrastinate about what has to be done
in the end you will feel depressed
helpless and give up on everything or
completely give up on the project work
you are working on
so the following solutions will be 5
great ways for you to overcome this
terrible state
listen together
1. remember why you want to do it
if you feel a lack of motivation when
you want to write an essay try to think
about why you want to do it
your reasons for doing something are the
driving force behind all your actions
for example why do people stop smoking
most people stop smoking because they
have a powerful reason
if they continue to smoke they can
suffer serious health problems that can
affect their loved ones
so why do you do these jobs
do you know why you want to achieve your
goal
make sure your reasons are strong and
realistic
when you feel unmotivated think about
why you want to do it
visualize success if you do it and feel
regret if you don't intuitive is a
powerful tool that you have available
and is completely free
you can think and imagine whatever
wherever and whenever you want
try to imagine vividly in as much detail
as possible for example your dream is to
drive a mercedes benz
picture vividly that you are driving
that car
imagine the model you want the color the
feeling when you sit inside the smell of
the leather upholstery feel the steering
and hear the rumbling engine sound
the point is when you imagine and
visualize something in your mind you
will feel motivated to do it
when you dream about the car you want
you will create an inner motivation that
you will work to have money to buy a car
try doing this when you feel like
procrastinating and don't have any
motivation
3. create a supportive environment
did you know your surroundings can
greatly affect your mood
tell me how do you feel when you have a
wonderful stay in a most luxurious
resort
do you feel more valuable and have more
confidence if you are always working
with successful people who talk about
business you should also learn and join
to talk about business topics
this is a good sign
it's also a way to help you become
active and use your surroundings to
boost your energy levels
on the other hand if you associate with
negative people who are always spreading
rumors and gossiping about others you
will also feel negative and unmotivated
to work sometimes you should also take
care of your surroundings like
decorating your workspace making it a
place that makes you want to be there
and try
remember your surroundings are very
important and it can affect you
so change the surroundings to motivate
yourself
dream big start small and act now
this is a powerful principle if you
apply it to your life
when you dream you have to dream big so
that your dreams can inspire you
however when you start you have to start
small because this will make it a habit
so that you automatically take constant
action every day
when your motivation is lost start small
take the smallest steps and develop from
there
for example if you want to exercise and
work out five days a week try to plan
and start slowly
even if it's just five minutes a day
commit to doing it right and just do it
once you get motivated you will get more
motivated and go to higher levels
5. take a rest
sometimes you just want to rest
remember success is not a destination it
is a journey that you need to go through
a long time
this is not a sprint but a marathon
many people mistake success as doing
something great and success will come
overnight
the truth is the opposite
almost all successful people who have
achieved great results are able to do so
because they persist long enough they
take consistent action and of course
they never give up
it is not something that can be created
in a few days not weeks and not even
months
true success takes years to build
so make sure you get enough rest and
rest when you need it
you need to understand your abilities
and to what extent you can do
if you're done with work you can reward
yourself by taking a rest
you find that after resting you will be
more energetic active and ready to fight
again
[Music]
you
